Properties.ProtectedString:
local function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do print(instance) wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(instance) end
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer local vTorso local vHumanoid
Tool.Enabled = true
local Wind_BoolValue = waitForChild(Tool, "Wind") local Wind_Weld = waitForChild(Tool, "WindWeld") local Fire_Part = waitForChild(Sword, "FirePart") local Wind_Fire = waitForChild(Fire_Part, "WindFire")
local Damage = 24
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local TimeOfDay
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player RBX_Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= vHumanoid and vHumanoid then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if Wind_Fire and Wind_Fire.Enabled == true then coroutine.resume(coroutine.create(function() if humanoid and humanoid.Parent and humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") and not humanoid.Parent.Torso:FindFirstChild("DarkFire") then local cFire = Wind_Fire:Clone() cFire.Parent = humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") RBX_Debris:AddItem(cFire, 4) local duration = 4 while duration > 0 do UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(5) duration = duration - 1 wait(1.0) end end end)) end end end end
function onEquipped() if Wind_Weld then Wind_Weld.Parent = Tool end if Wind_Fire then Wind_Fire.Enabled = true end vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) vHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end
function onUnequipped() end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Sword.Touched:connect(blow)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do print(instance) wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(instance) end
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local vPlayer local vTorso local vHumanoid
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Slash_Animation local Stab_Animation local Darken_Animation
local Charge_Animation
local Slash_Sound
local MouseDown_Bool = false
local Camera = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera
local Darken_BoolValue local Animating_Bool = false
local WindCounter = 0
local PlayerGui local Wind_Gui local Wind_Frame local Bar_Frame
local Wave_Part = Instance.new("Part") Wave_Part.FormFactor = 3 Wave_Part.Size = Vector3.new(10, 0.2, 4)
local Top_Decal = Instance.new("Decal") Top_Decal.Texture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83658504" Top_Decal.Parent = Wave_Part Top_Decal.Face = "Top"
local Bottom_Decal = Top_Decal:Clone() Bottom_Decal.Face = "Bottom" Bottom_Decal.Parent = Wave_Part
local function createBarGui() if PlayerGui then Wind_Gui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") Wind_Gui.Name = "WindGui" Wind_Gui.Parent = PlayerGui
Wind_Frame = Instance.new("Frame") Wind_Frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 Wind_Frame.Name = "WindFrame" Wind_Frame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxSquare Wind_Frame.Parent = Wind_Gui Wind_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 220, 0, 30) Wind_Frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -110, 1, -130)
Bar_Frame = Instance.new("Frame") Bar_Frame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.0 Bar_Frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0.3, 0.9) Bar_Frame.Parent = Wind_Frame Bar_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 30) Bar_Frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, -8, 0, -8) Bar_Frame.Name = "Bar" end end
local function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent:IsA("Hat") and hit.Parent.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= vHumanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(13) local char = humanoid.Parent local cChildren = char:GetChildren() for i = 1, #cChildren do if cChildren[i]:IsA("Tool") or cChildren[i]:IsA("Hat") then cChildren[i].Parent = game.Workspace if cChildren[i]:FindFirstChild("Handle") then
local h = cChildren[i].Handle:Clone() h.CFrame = cChildren[i].Handle.CFrame h.Velocity = (vTorso.Position - h.Position).unit * 40.0 h.Parent = game.Workspace h.CanCollide = true
cChildren[i]:Destroy()
RBX_Debris:AddItem(h, 5.5) end end end end end end
local function releaseTheShockWave(counter) local wp = Wave_Part:Clone() wp.Size = wp.Size * (counter/30) wp.CFrame = CFrame.new(vTorso.Position, vTorso.Position + vTorso.CFrame.lookVector) wp.Transparency = 1.0 wp.CanCollide = false --wp.Anchored = true
local float_BodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") float_BodyForce.Name = "Float" float_BodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, 196.1 * wp:GetMass(), 0) float_BodyForce.Parent = wp
wp.Parent = game.Workspace
wp.Velocity = wp.CFrame.lookVector * 40.0 wp.Touched:connect(blow)
WindCounter = 0
RBX_Debris:AddItem(wp, 2.5) end
local function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) vTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
PlayerGui = waitForChild(vPlayer, "PlayerGui")
if not Wind_Gui or not Wind_Gui.Parent then createBarGui() end mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Animating_Bool == false then MouseDown_Bool = true Charge_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ChargeAnim) Charge_Animation:Play() local currentSpeed = vHumanoid.WalkSpeed while MouseDown_Bool do vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = math.min(vHumanoid.WalkSpeed + 0.1, 50) WindCounter = math.min(90, WindCounter + 1) Bar_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, WindCounter/90 * 220, 0, 30) wait(0.1) end if WindCounter > 30 then Spawn(function() releaseTheShockWave(WindCounter) end) end if Charge_Animation then Charge_Animation:Stop() end local vDirection = (vTorso.Position - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p).unit local mDirection = (vHumanoid.TargetPoint - Camera.CoordinateFrame.p).unit
local angleBetweenVectors = math.abs(math.acos(vDirection:Dot(mDirection))) if angleBetweenVectors < 0.5 then Slash_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.SlashAnim) Slash_Animation:Play() else Stab_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.StabAnim) Stab_Animation:Play() Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.5, 0, 1, -0, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0) wait(1.3) Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.5, 0, 0, 0, -1, -0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0) end vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = currentSpeed else end end)
mouse.Button1Up:connect(function() MouseDown_Bool = false if Animating_Bool == false then Tool.Enabled = false Animating_Bool = true wait(1.5) Tool.Enabled = true Animating_Bool = false end Bar_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 30) end)
mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(key) key = key:lower() if key == "q" then Darken_BoolValue = Tool:FindFirstChild("Darken") if Darken_BoolValue and Darken_BoolValue.Value == false then Animating_Bool = true Darken_Animation = vHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.DarkenAnim) Darken_Animation:Play() wait(0.4) vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 Darken_BoolValue.Value = true wait(2.0) Animating_Bool = false end end end) end
local function onUnequipped() -- Do stuff if Charge_Animation then Charge_Animation:Stop() end if Slash_Animation then Slash_Animation:Stop() end if Stab_Animation then Stab_Animation:Stop() end if Darken_Animation then Darken_Animation:Stop() end if Wind_Gui and Wind_Gui.Parent then --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer Wind_Gui:Destroy() end Animating_Bool = false Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.5, 0, 0, 0, -1, -0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0) MouseDown_Bool = false if vHumanoid then vHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
